name: gatsby-plugin-disqus
description: A component for integrating Disqus comments in Gatsby.
author: Brett Stevenson <bstevensondev@gmail.com> (https://brettstevenson.io)

scripts.copy-files: mkdir lib || true && cp .eslintrc.json readme.md package.json lib
scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn copy-files && babel src --out-dir lib --copy-files --ignore **/__tests__
scripts.npm-publish: git push --follow-tags origin master && yarn build && cd lib && npm publish && cd ../
